High Educational Attainment: Individuals with high education qualifications predominantly in managerial and administrative positions or long-term unemployment.
Low Educational Attainment - High Occupa: Individuals with lower education but engaging in higher occupational roles.
Low Educational Attainment - Slightly Hi: Individuals with low education involved in slightly higher roles in various sectors.
Never Worked or Long-term Unemployed: A group characterized by prolonged periods without employment regardless of educational background.
Mixed Occupational Status: Diverse backgrounds with varying levels of occupation and education, generally showing a blend of much and less experience.
